effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 640,803 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 271,417.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 72 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,220 and Haste by 8,172.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 306,963, and Intellect by 7,751.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Dr. Scrapheal to heal your target additionally for 216,520.

When a nearby ally's health falls below 35%, Dr. Scrapheal springs into action, delivering instant care to heal them for 844,062. This effect can only activate once every 1 min.

description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.
